isuues.value: Children,Education & Literacy,Environment & Forests,Rural Development & Poverty Alleviation

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Nabagram Block SC/ST Backward Community Progressive Society is a rural based registered organization dedicated for the cause of disadvantaged,underprivileged poor and needy segments of people.In consonance with national objectives and priorities,it has been undertaking various activities for the cause of the rural poor.This organization which has already completed 21 years has the confidence to keep its activities with active support of all concerned,particularly the donor agencies and the people of the community.The mission of the Society is to strengthen the socio-economic condition in the area of operation by providing financial and other support services to the poor and needy segmenrs of people on a sustainable basis.The Activities/Programme highlights of the organization are: 1. Celebration of National Notable Days days of national importance are observed in a befitting manner with hoisting of National flag,Procession with colorful festoons and banners,distribution of sweets 7 snacks to the participants 2.Celebration of Birth Anniversary of Great sons of the country Birth anniversaries of the great sons of the country e.g.,dr.b.R.ambedkar,rabindranath Tagore,Mahatma Gandhi,netaji subhas chandra Bose are observed as a mark of respect & tributes to them 3. Rajiv Gandhi National creche Scheme with the assistance & financial support of Central Social Welfare Board,4(four) creche centres are being run at 4(four) different places of Nabagram Block.25 children are accommodated at each centre under the supervision of the respective creche mothers with facilities of reading,writing,safe drinking water and nutritional facilities etc. 4. Construction of low cost sanitation units Low cost sanitation toilets are constructed in all the 12 GPs of Khargram Block.In order to make mission successful and result- oriented,Awareness Programmes and group meetings are held in all the 12 GPs followed by folk songs on sanitation,demonstration workshops,mike canvassing etc. 5. Construction of School Toilets for a clean & hygienic conditions at the School premises,school toilets are constructed Achievements of these activities have been observed,as creches have enabled working mothers augment income by placing their children in the creches, low cost sanitation have caused multi faceted development of the community.

Their journey began with a street theatre NAI RAJYER SABHA. This was followed by some proscenium theatres as ITI TOMADER LILA (a play against child marriage), I (against women assault), KHELA (an intimate theatre), SAFAR (this was financially supported by Sangeet Natak Akademi), LIFE (against drug addiction).

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: (a) To run, maintain, manage and carry on the above society for the pur pose of informal Education on Performing Art i.e. Drawing, Art, Painting, Music, Dance, Songs, Preservation, Restoration of Painting and archival ma terials, Publication and other Cultural Education centre among the interested persons. (b) To give necessary training to the interested persons in the centre as well outside centres duly affiliated by the society with the help of the qualified train ers/teachers. (c) To render sincere and efficient services to the students of the Society. (d) To provide computer facilities and training for the students to learn in various aspects of commercial sectors. (e) To provide drawing, music, song, dance equipments for needy stu dents. (e) To upgrade the standard of teaching and learning of the society regular monitoring will be done. (f) To arrange and organise lectures, seminars & discussions for the dis semination of tangible and intangible heritage. (g) To publish or cause to be published useful literatures,books, journals magazines, etc. (h) To help the neady students for pursuing of studies. (f) To hold and conduct Examinations of the students as per syllabus of the Society and to award certificate to the successful candidates. (g) To help the orphans and under priviledged people and the weaker sec tion of the society by way of teaching, learning aids to the orphans by different ways social inclusion. (h) To organise the Social Welfare such as Health Programme and Awarness programmes of the society for social empowerment.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Four young theatre workers, few well wishers and some unemployed youth came together and found NAHALEE on May 22nd, 2005. In the year 2007 on 26th July we registered our group under the West Bengal Society Registration Act-1961(Reg.No.-S/1L/46058) Our Main Activities are: â€¢We Perform Drama, Mime, Dance Drama through proper training and practice. â€¢Work with underprivileged individuals who are creative and talented. â€¢To improve the overall cultural environment of the locality, we organize various cultural activities (viz.Theatre festival, Cultural competition, Training etc). â€¢Working with children to make them one of our society.. â€¢Use Art and Culture as a Therapy. â€¢School Theatre Programme. â€¢Training and Workshops. Our Achievements are: â€¢Conducted training and workshops on Theatre with different Organizations like CINI, CRY, MJCC, and SAHAY in the last six years. â€¢Nahalee dealt with 350 children (approx), who got training on different aspects of theatre and other form of Arts like (Dance, Drawing, Mime and song). â€¢It was noticed in the school theatre programme that students have learnt to communicate better with each other, spontaneity developed and theatre also gave them a medium to express themselves freely. Many of them developed interest in Theatre. â€¢Nahalee was invited in the following festivals: Sangeet Natak Academy Young Theatre Artist Drama Festival â€“ 2008 Natya Chetna(Odessa) Drama Festival-2010 Thealight Drama Festival- 2011 Bol Jamoore children street theatre festival by CRY -2010 and 2011 â€¢We organized an open air Theatre festival (Annual Programme 2011-2012). â€¢We have performed more than 125 street shows in the last four years for different Organizations like CINI, MJCC etc on various topics like Child Rights and other social issues. â€¢Through our experimental theatre with children, we were able to bring privileged and underprivileged children under one platform and in future it can help us in research based work.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Some of Our present fields of activities Arsenic Free Safe Drinking Water at Schools Water and Sanitary Hygiene including Menstrual Hygiene of Adolescent Girl Students Basic Literacy & Education for Seasonal Migratory Children of migratory Brick Kiln workers at Brick fields Prevention, awareness and control programme in HIV/AIDS In TB programme Awareness, Filed Surveys and Patient Referral and Tracking Sustainable and Organic Eco-friendly Agriculture Promotion Major achievements in few years Naihati Prolife with WFP India and United ways Kolkata implemented WASH program in 59 high schools and 119 primary schools of manyblocks of both 24 Parganas and Nadia district of West Bengal Main focus of WASH program was construction of facilities to access safe drinking water and toilet blocks round the year with safety dignity and privacy particularly for the girl children Menstrual hygiene was our key focus area where adolescent girls student study Regular hygiene education sessions for effective sustenance of the sanitary facilities This yielded 62 percent Primary and 86 percent secondary level students reported they always wash their hands before and after taking meals and using toilets Within 1 Year boys Habit of open field urination decreased from 39 to 2 percent Toilets are always kept clean by the students The WATSAN Committee of students played as sustainable agent to these facilities Within 1 Year Girls Absenteeism during Period downfrom 67 to 14 percent The drinking water stations toilets etc designed and built by us took into cognizance both aesthetic point of view and what the children prefers Girls Change Rooms installed to maintain hygiene dignity and ensure privacy which decreased the absenteeism HIV/AIDS Our team is one of the oldest and closest partners of WBSAPCS since its inception by GOI Since 1995 Our work in this field acknowledged by DFID UK and funded us since 1999 With the help of WBSAPCS and NACO we have worked in municipalities and rural blocks in two districts among FSWs and clients along with truckers and migrant workers Major achievements Promotion of 10 million of male and 100 thousand female condom as part of safe sexual practices Provided STI syndromic treatment among one lakh patients of high risk groups Prevented around one million STI within 12 years of services STOP TB As a partner of the CARE INDIA German Leprosy and TB relief Association of India we worked for the 6 Tuberculosis Units Provided DOTS to nearly ten thousand people Provided awareness nearly one million people Education Issues Literacy and anti drug therapy programme for platforms children and orphans produced excellent results The DRM of Eastern Railway was so very pleased thereby arranged a Railway Quarter to continue services we took literacy drives and education towards children of seasonally migrant labourers at the brick fields with Sealdah Loreto Day School and KMWSC to provide education nearly 2000 brick field children reached during last six years Naihati Prolife has conducted workshops with farming communities on pest control by means of friendly insects Vermi culture promotion for soil remediation etc
